Description: Fast approximate contig coverage for metagenomic binning
bio.tool_description: fast approximate contig coverage for metagenomic binningFairy computes multi-sample contig coverage for metagenome-assembled genome (MAG) binning.Fairy is used after metagenomic assembly and before binning. It can- Calculate coverage 100x-1000x faster than read alignment (e.g. BWA)- Give comparable bins for multi-sample binning (short read or nanopore reads)- Output formats that are compatible with MetaBAT2, MaxBin2, SemiBin2, and more
